title: 96/295/EC: Commission Decision of 18 April 1996 identifying and listing the units in the Animo computer network and repealing Decision 92/175/EEC (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 18 April 1996 identifying and listing the units in the Animo computer network and repealing Decision 92/175/EEC (Text with EEA relevance) (96/295/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list and identification of the units within the meaning of Article 1 of Decision 91/398/EEC shall be as set out in the Annex.
This Decision shall apply from 1 April 1996.
Decision 92/175/EEC is hereby repealed from 1 April 1996. References to the repealed Decision shall be construed as being made to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 April 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 29.
(2) OJ No L 62, 15. 3. 1993, p. 49.
(3) OJ No L 221, 9. 8. 1991, p. 30.
(4) OJ No L 80, 25. 3. 1992, p. 1.
